celestial.name: Celestial
celestial.description: All allies heal based on damage Celestial units deal.

cybernetic.name: Cybernetic
cybernetic.description: Cybernetics with an item gain bonus Attack Damage and Health.

darkstar.name: Dark Star
darkstar.description: en a Dark Star Champion dies, all other allied Dark Star Champions gain Attack Damage and Spell Power

chrono.name: Chrono
chrono.description: All allies gain Attack Speed every 4 seconds.

spacepirate.name: Space Pirate
spacepirate.description: 50% chance to drop gold or items whenever a Space Pirate lands a killing blow.

bonuses.effect: 1 Gold and 10% chance to drop an item

mechpilot.name: Mech-Pilot
mechpilot.description: At the start of combat, three random Mech-Pilots are merged into a Super-Mech until it dies.

rebel.name: Rebel
rebel.description: At the start of combat, Rebels gain a Health Shield for 8 seconds and Increased Damage for each adjacent Rebel.

starguardian.name: Star Guardian
starguardian.description: Whenever a Star Guardian casts, all other Star Guardians gain Mana.

bonuses.effect: Valkyrie attacks and spells always crit targets below 50% health
